name: image-verification
description: MCP server for detecting AI-generated, tampered, and fake document images. Validates boarding passes, IRCTC tickets, and generic images.
author: FluidMCP Team

tools.name: verify_image_authenticity
tools.description: Verify if an image or PDF is authentic, AI-generated, or tampered. Supports images (JPEG, PNG) and PDFs. Analyzes metadata, OCR, document structure, and AI artifacts.

image_base64.description: Base64 encoded image or PDF data

tools.name: get_supported_document_types
tools.description: Get list of supported document types for verification
